description:
KDE Plasma 6.1 desktop environment is now available for public beta testing with explicit GPU synchronization support and other new features. Here's what to expect from the final release on June 18th.

The post KDE Plasma 6.1 Beta Released with Explicit Sync Support on Wayland appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: KDE Plasma 6.1 Beta Released with Explicit Sync Support on Wayland
